IHn: m + n = n + m

m + S n = S n + m

Qed.```

- simpl. auto.

```coq
intros q Hq.
destruct (sss_dec st1 st2) as [Hst12 | Hnst12].
- exists 0. split. omega. apply out_code_refl.
- assert (Hk: k > 0) by omega.
  destruct k as [|k'].
  + omega.
  + assert (Hst1t3: st1 ⟬ P ⦒ st3) by (eapply P//_st1_st2_st3; eauto).
    assert (Hst2t3: st2 ⟬ P ⦒ st3) by (eapply P//_st1_st2_st3; eauto).
    destruct (sss_dec st1 st3) as [Hst13 | Hnst13].
    * exists 1. split. omega. eapply out_code_step; eauto.
    * assert (Hst2t1: st2 ⟬ P ⦒ st1) by (eapply sss_fun; eauto).
      destruct (sss_dec st2 st3) as [Hst23 | Hnst23].
      - exists 1. split. omega. eapply out_code_step; eauto.
      - assert (Hk': k' > 0) by omega.
        destruct k' as [|k''].
        + omega.
        + assert (Hst1t2: st1 ⟬ P ⦒ st2) by (eapply sss_fun; eauto).
          assert (Hst2t1': st2 ⟬ P ⦒ st1) by (eapply sss_fun; eauto).
          assert (Hst3t2: st3 ⟬ P ⦒ st2) by (eapply sss_fun; eauto).
          exists 2. split. omega. eapply out_code_step; eauto.
Qed.
